Ring of Returning

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 422
(returning [returning])

Requires 15S to forge (S3)

This magical ring will know if its wearer gets wounded. If that happens, it will immediately teleport its wearer back home. This returning is as safe as it can be but, if the home castle has been conquered by enemies, the returning will most likely become disastrous.
